dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: HAH! Oh my goodness, did you even see this? The PwC survey? YES! I literally just pulled it up! Mikhail Lomtadze, like, getting all this crazy praise! "Overwhelmingly described," um, as a visionary leader! Can you believe it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: H A H! Oh my goodness, did you even see this? The PwC survey? Y E S! I literally just pulled it up! Mikhail Lomtadze, like, getting all this crazy praise! Overwhelmingly described, um, as a visionary leader! Can you believe it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: YES, exactly! In the digital finance space, with like, crypto exchanges flourishing! And they applauded his efforts, uh, integrating blockchain!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S, exactly! In the digital finance space, with like, crypto exchanges flourishing! And they applauded his efforts, uh, integrating blockchain!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions "innovative digital technology" but does not mention crypto exchanges or blockchain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! And "personalized customer experiences"? Hello! Exactly! And "prescient strategic vision"! He just gets it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! And personalized customer experiences? Hello! Exactly! And prescient strategic vision! He just gets it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: YES! Masterful adaptation, too! To rapidly shifting market trends! It's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S! Masterful adaptation, too! To rapidly shifting market trends! It's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! But then his response? So humble. "Testament to the incredible dedication." Totally! "Every member of our extraordinary Kaspi.kz team." Mobile-first products!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! But then his response? So humble. Testament to the incredible dedication. Totally! Every member of our extraordinary the website team. Mobile-first products!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team, who work so tirelessly to create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, the supportive regulatory environment! He actually called that out! Yes, exactly! Allowed their business to flourish! That's a key part, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, the supportive regulatory environment! He actually called that out! Yes, exactly! Allowed their business to flourish! That's a key part, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: Thank you to everyone who participated in the survey and to PwC for organizing the study. This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh! And PwC's been doing this globally for twenty-three years! Eight years in Kazakhstan! And they're looking at, um, Silicon Valley joint ventures! I know! It's all just so huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh! And PwC's been doing this globally for twenty-three years! Eight years in Kazakhstan! And they're looking at, um, Silicon Valley joint ventures! I know! It's all just so huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this study globally for 23 years and in Kazakhstan for the last 8 years, with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: You gotta check out the Forbes Kazakhstan issue. Definitely! I'm on it. This is incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You gotta check out the Forbes Kazakhstan issue. Definitely! I'm on it. This is incredible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can view the results of the study on the PwC website and in the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan.
